javax.swing.plaf.nimbus

Class ShadowEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.nimbus.Effect
      • javax.swing.plaf.nimbus.ShadowEffect
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DropShadowEffect, InnerShadowEffect

    abstract class ShadowEffect
extends Effect
    ShadowEffect - base class with all the standard properties for shadow effects
    Author:
    Created by Jasper Potts (Jun 18, 2007)
